Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. John the Short:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt e#y#u# n~dikeoc Abba Iwann/c pikoloboc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of our holy and righteous father, Abba John the Short, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
